articles.description: Danny Cowley is optimistic on the injury prognosis of missing pair Joe Rafferty and Michael Jacobs.
articles.content:
The duo were absent from the Blues 2-0 win at Burton on Tuesday night which made it six wins and undefeated from their opening eight League One fixtures.
Rafferty has been troubled by a stomach musc… [+1928 chars]

articles.author: Marc Iles
articles.title: Bolton Wanderers' players rated out of 10 in 2-0 victory against MK Dons - The Bolton News
articles.description: Dion Charles and Gethin Jones were on the scoresheet in Wanderers' 2-0 win against MK Dons - but who impressed on the night?
articles.content:
JAMES TRAFFORD6.5
Organised, used the ball pretty well, collected a few crosses and patrolled the edge of his area well. Comfortable night, and he will hope for more like this.

articles.title: Jacob Wakeling nets late as Swindon Town beat Sutton United 3-2 in League Two - Swindon Advertiser
articles.description: JACOB Wakeling netted an injury-time winner as Swindon Town beat Sutton United 3-2 at the County Ground on Tuesday night.
articles.content:
JACOB Wakeling netted an injury-time winner as Swindon Town beat Sutton United 3-2 at the County Ground on Tuesday night.
